DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study address gap knowledge regard relationship eating frequency weight loss .
DOC.brief_title: Healthy Eating Patterns During Lifestyle Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: Little intervention research conduct examine influence eat frequency ( EF ) weight loss . It hypothesize increase EF improve appetite control , assist good regulation energy intake , thus decrease body mass index . Unfortunately , outcome show great appetite control increase EF . Instead , trend favor low EF reduce energy intake thereby produce great weight loss higher eating frequency . Thus , low eat frequency may lower energy intake via behavioral mechanism . At thit time research examine behavioral mechanism may mediate relationship lower eating frequency superior adherence energy-restricted diet .
DOC.criteria: age 18 65 year healthy overweight obese men woman body mass index ( BMI ) 27 45 kg/m square report heart condition , chest pain period activity rest , loss consciousness Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PAR Q ) report unable walk 2 block ( 1/4 mile ) without stop currently participate weight loss program and/or take weight loss medication lose > 5 % body weight past 6 month diagnose type 1 2 diabetes bariatric surgery planning bariatric surgery next 4 month intend move outside metropolitan area within time frame investigation pregnant , lactating , < 6 month postpartum , plan become pregnant investigation
